description: First up, Ted Sarandos, Chief Content Officer at Netflix, on shipping Netflix's original content overseas. Then, Stephen Cobb, Security Researcher at ESET, talks about what users should keep in mind when using 3rd party services on top of apps like Snapchat and Dropbox. Finally, Susan Crawford, Visiting Professor at Harvard Law School and co-author of The Responsive City: Engaging Communities through Data-Smart Governance, joins Ben to discuss how city governments can make better choices with respect to data and technology.
teaser: First up, Ted Sarandos, Chief Content Officer at Netflix, on shipping Netflix's original content overseas. Then, Stephen Cobb, Security Researcher at ESET, talks about what users should keep in mind when using 3rd party services on top of apps like Snapchat and Dropbox. Finally, Susan Crawford, Visiting Professor at Harvard Law School and co-author of The Responsive City: Engaging Communities through Data-Smart Governance, joins Ben to discuss how city governments can make better choices with respect to data and technology.
title: Marketplace Tech for Wednesday, October 15, 2014
